#summary Instructions on how to play Text Invaders
#labels Featured
=Instructions=
==Installlation==
Currently, there is no installer. Simply download the .jar file and run it in whatever way your system allows it to run.
==Controls==
  * Arrow keys control movement
  * Spacebar shoots
  * Escape pauses
  * Enter is used in menus to select options
